A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A movie that outright disregards and lacks utter respect for the movies preceding it. Rian Johnson said it is difficult to direct a middle movie for a trilogy. What he doesn't say is that this movie is ridden with huge plothole\, slapstick comedy and romance\, no character arc payoff. I mean what the fuck. If you could destroy a destroyer fleet/ship by jumping in hyperspace through it\, why not destroy death star and Starkiller Base like this? Leia pulls off what could only be a deus ex machina. Luke\, Kylo and Rey can apparently use Skype through the force.That awkward romance b/w rose and Finn and that kiss seems so forced and out of place. Just plz don't allow him to direct another spinoff trilogy.
